title: Crone of War
description: I am a child of the Goddess Morrigan…I was born in the land of Éire…And my heart blazes with its fury…I have lived through the ages…I seek to right those who have wronged…I am the Maintainer of the Balance…The Balance must be maintainedThe Lamia expeditionary force has gained a foothold in Éire and has formed an alliance with a powerful Irish chieftain and his malevolent mother. To reinforce them, a massive Lamia army, which is departing Rome, will soon give them enough power to conquer Eire and find their lost treasure. Will the Deargh Du and their new found friends be able to protect Eire from the invaders, or will the Deargh Du’s suspicion of other blood-drinkers allow their enemies to be victorious?Continue the journey... the second in a series of stories revolving around the Deargh Du through the ages.
author: Heather Poinsett Dunbar
